ALLOW_CALLS_FROM_EVERYONE_FOOTER_TEXT: No incoming calls or messages will be silenced.
TOP_BANNER_EXLPANATION: Banners appear at the top of the screen and go away automatically.
SHOW_IN_LOCK_SCREEN_FOOTER: Show alerts in the lock screen.
ALLOW_CALLS_FROM_FOOTER_TEXT_FACETIME: Incoming FaceTime calls and messages from “%@” will not be silenced.
VIP_GROUP_FOOTER_TEXT: VIP Settings will override all other Mail notification settings.
ALLOW_CALLS_FROM_FOOTER_TEXT: Incoming calls from “%@” will not be silenced.
NO_ALLOWED_CALLS_FROM_FOOTER_TEXT_FACETI: Incoming FaceTime calls or messages from everyone will be silenced.
SILENCE_ONLY_LOCKED_GROUP_FOOTER_IPOD: Incoming FaceTime calls and notifications will be silenced while iPod is locked.
NO_ALLOWED_CALLS_FROM_FOOTER_TEXT: Incoming calls or messages from everyone will be silenced.
ALLOW_CALLS_FROM_ALL_CONTACTS_FOOTER_TEX: Incoming calls from your contacts will not be silenced.
TITLE: Notifications
SCHEDULED_FOOTER_TEXT_FACETIME: Incoming FaceTime calls and Notifications will be silenced during the specified time while locked.
DND_HEADER: When Do Not Disturb is enabled calls and alerts that arrive while locked will be silenced, and a moon icon will appear in the status bar.
ALLOW_CALLS_FROM_FAVORITES_FOOTER_TEXT_F: Incoming FaceTime calls and messages from your favorites will not be silenced.
SILENCE_ONLY_LOCKED_GROUP_FOOTER_IPHONE: Incoming calls and notifications will be silenced while iPhone is locked.
ALLOW_CALLS_FROM_EVERYONE_FOOTER_TEXT_FA: No incoming FaceTime calls and messages will be silenced.
ENABLE_NOTIFICATIONS_TEXT: Turn on Notifications to enable Sounds, Alerts and Home Screen Badges for applications.
LOCKSCREEN_FOOTER: Show alerts on the lock screen, and in Notification Center when it is accessed from the lock screen.
NOTIFICATION_CENTER_HEADER: Swipe down from the top of the screen to view Notification Center.
SILENCE_ALWAYS_GROUP_FOOTER_IPHONE: Incoming calls and notifications will be silenced while iPhone is either locked or unlocked.
CALENDAR_FOOTER: Only these Calendars will receive Notifications.
REPEATED_CALL_FOOTER_TEXT: When enabled, a second call from the same person within three minutes will not be silenced.
SILENCE_ALWAYS_GROUP_FOOTER_IPOD: Incoming FaceTime calls and notifications will be silenced while iPod is either locked or unlocked.
SCHEDULED_FOOTER_TEXT: Incoming calls and Notifications will be silenced during the specified time while locked.
ALLOW_CALLS_FROM_FAVORITES_FOOTER_TEXT: Incoming calls from your favorites will not be silenced.
DND_HEADER_FACETIME: When Do Not Disturb is enabled, a moon icon will appear in the status bar and incoming FaceTime calls and alerts will be silenced.
DISABLE_NOTIFICATIONS_TEXT: Turn off Notifications to disable Sounds, Alerts and Home Screen Badges for the applications below.
FULL_SCREEN_EXPLANATION: Alerts require an action before proceeding.
ALLOW_CALLS_FROM_ALL_CONTACTS_FOOTER_TEX: Incoming FaceTime calls and messages from your contacts will not be silenced.
REPEATED_CALL_FOOTER_TEXT_FACETIME: When enabled, a second FaceTime call from the same person within three minutes will not be silenced.
